overview: Brenna’s world is turned upside down as her pampered life as a trophy wife comes to an abrupt end. As things continue to spiral out of control, she finds herself in jail with no money or friends. Enter Charlie … a hardened bounty hunter that is desperately running out of time to bring in a dangerous criminal. Desperate, he agrees to bail out Brenna and share the reward money with her if she’ll go undercover in a strip club. With Brenna serving as “the bait”, Charlie surprisingly finds himself falling for the once bratty housewife. Stay tuned as we find out who ultimately gets “hooked”!
tagline: He fell for her hook, line and sinker...
title: The Bait
